pkgmetadata.longdescription: Raw Accelerometer Data Analysis // A tool to process and analyse data collected with wearable raw acceleration sensors as described in van Hees and colleagues (2014) doi: 10.1152/japplphysiol.00421.2014 and (2015) doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0142533. The package has been developed and tested for binary data from 'GENEActiv' https://www.activinsights.com/ and GENEA devices (not for sale), .csv-export data from 'Actigraph' http://actigraphcorp.com devices, and .cwa and .wav-format data from 'Axivity' https://axivity.com/product/ax3. These devices are currently widely used in research on human daily physical activity.
